name: When?
description:
How do you tell someone you're going to die?

Playtime: ~30 minutes. 

This game includes themes about death, depression, mania and delirium as well an element of horror. There is also frequent use of coarse language. 

Note that the web version is slightly laggier than the executables.

Made for the NaNoRenO 2022 Game Jam in ~9 days.

Musician's SoundCloud (Bis_mii)

Programmer's GitHub (sh1ggy)

Artist's Instagram (rellosie)

Sound effects sourced from freesound, storyblocks & fesliyanstudios
